Text:
The title says this is 5.1 but it's actually 2.0.  

Where's my PublicHD/iT00NZ release?! :)

There IS a 5.1 track.  It's track 1.  Track 2 is AAC stereo.

Neither is flagged as default, though, so you might want to remux in mkvtoolnix to either flag track 1 (and the video track) as default, or to just get rid of track 2 entirely.
